backup_success_tip: The backup task has been successfully created
clipboard_unsupported: Browser does not support Clipper API
database_empty: You don't have any databases yet
database_name_max_length: Database name length cannot exceed {{length}} characters
database_name_regex: Start with a letter, only allow lowercase letters, numbers and -
database_name_regex_error: Database name can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, -, and must start with a letter.
db_instances_tip: For optimal performance, use an odd number of {{db}} instances

dbconfig.confirm_updates: Please confirm the parameters you modified:
dbconfig.updates_tip: Changing the configuration of the mongo database will cause the database to restart
dbconfig.updates_tip2: Incorrect parameter values ​​may cause the database to fail to operate normally, so please operate with caution.

delete_backup_with_db_tip: Delete the databases but leave the backups as they are
delete_hint: Warning: This will permanently delete all data in the database. Confirm to proceed.
delete_sealaf_app_tip:
The database is deployed via cloud development. 
Simply deleting the database does not clear out all components of your app, which may still incur charges. 
To completely uninstall the app and clean all related components, uninstall the entire app in cloud development.
delete_template_app_tip: This app is managed by the app store. You are now going to the app store to delete all app components.
enter_save: Press Enter to save. 'All' exports the entire database.
guide_deploy_button: Complete creation and get it now
guide_terminal_button: Convenient terminal connection method improves data processing efficiency
important_tips_for_migrating:
A database is a system for storing and managing data, typically consisting of multiple databases (instances). Each database is an independent collection of objects such as tables, views, and stored procedures.
If the source and target databases share similarities (e.g., names or structures), it’s recommended to create a new database in the target system for the imported data, rather than importing it into an existing one. This helps prevent duplication and conflicts.
manual_backup_tip: Tip: Backup during off-peak hours. Avoid DDL operations to prevent locking. Be patient if data size is large. Backup starts 1 min after confirmation.

migrate.Incremental migration prompt information: Enable \"Continuous Migration\" for incremental DB sync (disabled by default).

mongo.check: Source Account: Read access to DB, admin, local\nSink Account: Read/write access to DB, read access to admin, local

mongodb.stepOne: # Replication cluster instance: no scaling needed. Provide primary address for migration.
mongodb.stepTwo: # Standalone instance: Extend to single-node replica set for CDC

postgresql.check: Source Account: Login access, read access to source, replication privileges\nSink Account: Login access, read/write access to sink
postgresql.stepTwo: # Ensure sufficient capacity for \"max_replication_slots\" and \"max_wal_senders\" parameters

migration_prompt_information: To prevent migration failure caused by XXX, please refrain from any operations during the migration process. The migration may take a while for large datasets. Your patience is appreciated.
multi_components_tip: The storage of the multi-component database will be allocated to each component.
multi_replica_redis_tip: Note: The price for multi-replica Redis includes HA nodes
name: Name
node_is_switching: Successfully sent switch request, please wait...
not_allow_standalone_use: This application is not allowed to be used alone. Click OK to go to Sealos Desktop for use.
paste_database_connection_desc: Paste the database connection here, and the database configuration information such as the host name will be automatically recognized
pause_hint: Suspend all computing resources (CPU and memory) and port billing, and only retain storage resources. Since port resources are recycled, the external network access port will be reallocated after recovery, and you need to update the connection information. Do you want to suspend now?
remark_tip: Contains up to 10 Chinese characters and 30 English characters
restart_error: Failed to restart due to an error
restore_backup_tip: Restoring a backup will create a new database. Please provide a unique name for the new DB.
single_node_tip: Single-node DB for development and testing only
start_error: Failed to start the database due to an error
termination_policy_tip: Whether to keep a backup when deleting the database
total_price_tip: The estimated cost does not include port fees and traffic fees, and is subject to actual usage.
update_sealaf_app_tip: The database is deployed through cloud development. To change the database, please go to cloud development.
wipeout_backup_with_db_tip: Delete the databases and the backups
you_have_successfully_deployed_database: You have successfully deployed and created a database!
pls_create: No results, please create your own
password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters
password_complexity: Password must include at least two of the following: letters, numbers, and special characters.
successfully_edit_password: Successfully edited password. The database will restart, please wait
edit_password_tip: Editing the password will cause the database to restart
ha_desc: Sentinel nodes take up extra resources
pod_completed: Pod has ended, cannot view logs
